rules_text:
[i]Ephraim's Charger – [/i]Knights you control have haste.
[i]For Renais[/i] – Whenever you cast a red spell, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
[i]Promote[/i] – At the beginning of your end step, if you attacked with three or more Knights this turn, transform Forde, Wild Knight.
Partner with Kyle, Ardent Knight
